MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G11 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Byres Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.51pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Partick Cross substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:14pm on Wednesday, 24 February 2021
